text: The home galaxy of humankind. The galaxy that contains the Solar System where the Earth orbits the Sun.

text: Ursa Major II Dwarf (UMa II dSph) is a dwarf spheroidal galaxy situated in the Ursa Major constellation and discovered in 2006 in the data obtained by the Sloan Digital Sky Survey.

text: The Draco Dwarf is a spheroidal galaxy which was discovered by Albert George Wilson of Lowell Observatory in 1954 on photographic plates of the National Geographic Society's Palomar Observatory Sky Survey (POSS).. The current shape is 3 smaller than actual size..
NGC 2419 is a globular cluster in the constellation Lynx. It was discovered by William Herschel on December 31
Sextans is a minor equatorial constellation which was introduced in 1687 by Johannes Hevelius. Its name is Latin for the astronomical sextant
column5: an instrument that Hevelius made frequent use of in his observations

text: The Carina Dwarf Spheroidal Galaxy is a dwarf galaxy in the Carina constellation. It was discovered in 1977 with the UK Schmidt Telescope by Cannon et al
Leo II (or Leo B) is a dwarf spheroidal galaxy about 690
column5: 000 light-years away in the constellation Leo. It is one of 24 known satellite galaxies of the Milky Way.
